document_data.name: Ophala Cheldarstorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Ophala Cheldarstorn''' was the covert owner of the [[Moonstone Mask]] as well as a respected member of the [[Many-Starred Cloak]].
document_data.Activities: Ophala once had a brief yet dangerous career as an adventurer of other planes, but she has since retired.
document_data.Relationships: She regarded the [[Harpers]], along with [[Elminster]] of [[Shadowdale]] as allies. She counted the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] of [[Luskan]] among her list of foes. Ophala's apprentices spent most of their time spying on the Brotherhood through magical means so its agents could be stopped.
document_data.History: During Sammaster's Rage, Ophala took [[Zundaerazylym]] -"The Laughing Wyrm" - to the Astral plane in a successful attempt to free her from the madness that was infecting Faer√ªn's dragons. At the time Zundarazylym was a laundress and seamstress at the Moonstone Mask.
